p: In this study, hexanoic acid (caproic acid, C6:0), decanoic acid (capric acid, C10:0), and octadecanoic acid (stearic acid, C18:0) were not detected in both CO oil and oleoresin. Lauric acid and myristic acid were the major fatty acids in CO oil and oleoresin, with relative abundance values higher than 2.45 Ã— 10 6 unit. Lauric acid is also considered a medium-chain fatty acid.
